channel.title: markdown on mlyixi的博客
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on mlyixi的博客

item.title: wordpress的markdown
item.description: Markdown快速参考 强调 1 2 *Emphasize* _emphasize_ **Strong** __Strong__ 超链接 1 A [link](http://example.com "Title"). 或 1 2 3 Some text with [a link][1] and another [link][2]. [1]: http://example.com/ "Title" [2]: http://example.org/ "Title" 图片 1 Logo: ![Alt](/wp.png "Title") 或 1 2 Smaller logo: ![Alt][1] [1]: /wp-smaller.png "Title" 脚注 1 2 I have more [^1] to say up here. [^1]: To say down here. 换行 wordpress不支持双空格换行,只能支持回车换行 列表 1 2 * Item - Item 或 1 2 3 4 5 1. Item 2. Item * Mixed * Mixed 3. Item 区块 1 2 3 > Block 1 > Block 2
